timeline.message:
Remaining gc compiler master/slave replacements

Signed-off-by: Theresa Mammarella <Theresa.T.Mammarella@ibm.com>

Attach masterLock to controllerLock

Signed-off-by: Theresa Mammarella <Theresa.T.Mammarella@ibm.com>

Attach masterLock to controllerLock

Signed-off-by: Theresa Mammarella <Theresa.T.Mammarella@ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText:
The changes in this class are problematic, as they are publicly documented API. Changing these could break a user's application.
https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSYKE2_8.0.0/com.ibm.java.api.80.doc/com.ibm.lang.management/com/ibm/lang/management/MemoryMXBean.html
timeline.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText: I think all we can do here is add the alternatives in addition to the original API, and deprecate the original for later removal.
replies.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText:
We'll also have to generate new docs.
The OpenJ9 version of the docs
https://www.eclipse.org/openj9/docs/api-langmgmt/
https://www.eclipse.org/openj9/docs/api/jdk8/jre/management/extension/com/ibm/lang/management/MemoryMXBean.html
replies.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText: I have added back and deprecated the master/slave public methods and created a docs issue: eclipse-openj9/openj9-docs#607
replies.author: theresa-m

timeline.message:
Deprecate MemoryMXBean methods for gc master/slave

Signed-off-by: Theresa Mammarella <Theresa.T.Mammarella@ibm.com>

Deprecate MemoryMXBean methods for gc master/slave

Signed-off-by: Theresa Mammarella <Theresa.T.Mammarella@ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Pls use the long form for Java 11+, i.e. @Deprecated(forRemoval=true, since="15").
You can create the processor instructions for Java 16 and remove the methods for Java 16+.
timeline.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText: I have updated the deprecated annotation and added preprocessor instructions to remove the methods in Java16.
replies.author: theresa-m

timeline.message:
Deprecate MemoryMXBean methods for gc master/slave

Signed-off-by: Theresa Mammarella <Theresa.T.Mammarella@ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: I don't think this works for Java 8 (Java 8 won't compile), you need to use the processor.
timeline.author: pshipton
